website_summaries.verdict: A durable pool brush with a patented spoiler shape that helps keep the bristles pressed against the pool wall while sweeping.
pros: This nylon pool brush is 18 inches long and features a built-in spoiler that makes it easier to sweep while adding additional downward pressure to each stroke
The unit is designed to quickly attach to a standard-size aluminum pool pole and it releases with a single push
cons: The quick-release plastic pins that keep the brush on the pole are not as durable as the rest of the brush

customer_reviews.title: Broken brush
customer_reviews.text: I used this brush for approximately 2 1/2 months before the metal attachment snapped off, leaving the brush at the bottom of the pool. I don't feel like this is normal. However, the CEO was quick to respond stating this is extremely rare, and Amazon quickly sent a replacement brush. I do love this brush and its ease of use
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: One of the best pool brush you can use
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pool brush you can use. Quick release and it brushes the wall with help of the small flip of a fin in top for .added pressure This is my second one since finding this brush., I have tried the large whale fin brush , Their good they have lot more pressure on those but the whale fin can crack or brake. as mine did . As always bristles ware out after time .It may not have the curve sides as some others but that's fine for me. Highly recommend this brush .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT! Worth 10 STARS! Probably the best Amazon purchase I ever made!
customer_reviews.text: After a year of using this brush I will NEVER buy any other brush again! This product does exactly what they claim and is the most durable, sturdy pool brush I've ever owned! Outlasted any other brush I've ever bought and still looks brand new! AMAZING PRODUCT! Would have given it 10 STARS if I could! Probably the best Amazon purchase I ever made!
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, very nice brush with stiff bristles
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even used this brush yet and already I like it better than any brush I've ever owned. Previous brushes had bristles that were too soft or a plastic shaft where it connected to the pole that would break after only a short time. This one has bristles that are stiff and the connection is aluminum rather than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Writesalot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design
customer_reviews.text: As of right now I give this brush 5 Stars across the board. I purchased this brush simply because mine broke, I did not have any expectations of its design but, when I received this and tried it for the first time, all I can say is I’m so happy I took a chance on this one. I know it’s only a brush and what can be the difference from on to another, well, this brush does exactly what it claims. When you put this brush on the pool wall and stroke down, it literally sticks to the wall making your job so much easier. I would give this brush 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Dino2012

customer_reviews.title: Above average
customer_reviews.text: This is an above average brush. It is definitely better than the cheap ones sold at the big box hardware stores. However, it is not great. The two things it lacks are (1) bristle stiffness and (2) edge bristles. The softness of the bristles reduces the effectiveness of this brush. The lack of edge bristles combined with the broader head make cleaning in tight corners next to impossible. For flat surface cleaning, it works well. For wall cleaning, it is an improvement over standard brushes where you must apply force to maintain wall contact.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is awesome. I love the way it hugs the wall. It also glides across the floor of the pool smoothly. It does have a little harder drag pulling it back but it floats right to the top of the water which helps a lot. Great product. Wish I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, better than no "aqua-dynamic"
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it for half of one season, but so far it works great. What sold me on it is that it keeps itself against the wall during cleaning. So I don't have to leverage the pole like I did with the old style. It tends to raise itself from the surface on pull-back which is a small pain, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easier for brushing surfaces that are difficult to access from poolside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the model with a moving flap which was still working fine after 8 years except that the bristles had worn to 1/4". It is a good product and solidly constructed in my opinion there is less downward pressure created than that of my old "flap brush" but it is still adequate to do the job well. Highly recommended especially if your pool curves in and out or for brushing horizontally along the upper edges which makes using a regular pool brush less effective because you are unable to get good pressure contact pressure with all surfaces. I think this brush will last well.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: You Need This
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brush. Nit sure if it's anew concept pr I've just not seen to before. Best pool brush I've owned in 19 years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I like it but wanted more downforce
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the SweepEase with the hopes of having better success sweeping the sides of my pool. It does work better than a standard brush because there is a small amount of downforce that gives a little more pressure and the bristles are better made. I was hopeful that it would hug the walls a little better than it does. I definitely prefer to use this over my old one but if it had a slightly larger fin, maybe it would push downward more forcefully. It's a good product and I will buy again should it need to be replaced. Just didn't live up to my hopes and expectations regarding improved wall sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Rusty in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brush, but, I bought it a little over 4 months ago and is rusting. It left rust stains on my pool deck. This item should not rust given that it is supposed to go in water.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a little extra!
customer_reviews.text: Takes very little effort to scrub stuck on gunk from the bottom of my salt pool. I rinse it with fresh water after every use to help it last longer. I absolutely LOVE how little effort this takes. I'm so glad I found this and spent the extra money. SO WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until the little plastic thingie that holds the pole to the brush broke off. I was ready to give it 1 star at that point. However, I called the number on SweepEase website. They said they would send me a couple to replace it. If that piece was a heavier plastic, or something not likely to break again, I would give this brush 5 stars. Should they fail to send the replacement piece, I will update. I do recommend the brush. Just know that piece is kind of flimsy, so be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but nothing spectacular
customer_reviews.text: It’s not magic, nothing amazing about it. This works just like my existing brush. The whole one hand brushing is oversold. If you don’t have a brush or need a new one then get it. If you think of this as a massive upgrade to an working brush then you may be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Pool Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is pretty good, but not fabulous. The swoop of the plastic is supposed to keep the bristles pushed firmly against the pool bottom and walls to more effectively remove crud. For the most part, it does hold pretty well to the surface material, but it occasionally takes more than one sweep to clean off algae. It's definitely easier to use than a regular brush that requires some serious upper-body strength to push the bristles against the surface. I would rate this about 4.5 stars and I would buy it again, but I think overall the Whale Tail pool brush is a little better.
customer_reviews.author: K.K. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, makes it so easy to sweep pool! We’ve had inground pool for almost 30 years and tried many things, this I HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the Wall Whale
customer_reviews.text: Someone on the Trouble Free Pool forum said he liked this brush better than the Wall Whale, which I also own. I disagree. The Sweep Ease doesn't provide enough force against the pool wall. In my opinion, the Wall Whale is a better product because its force is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket J Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: The 3 things I love about this brush
customer_reviews.text: The 3 things I love about this brush, the bristles are stiff enough to wipe off dirt, the bristles are angled on the ends to avoid plaster scraping and the shape really makes it easier to stay on the wall while brushing. only 1 problem: I wish the plastic "buttons" on the piece that connects it to the pole were longer to fit more secure. My pole is new but the diameter may not a standard size? It looks like that may be a problem down the road.
customer_reviews.author: vicsor

customer_reviews.title: A-mazing! Saves Your back, Your Pole & Your Sanity!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the best Amazon purchases I've made. Typically amazon purchases are products that are required and direct replacements for what I would of bought in store however this does not fit that "norm". This brush is A-Freaking-Mazing! The perfectly engineered curves help it glide through the water so effortlessly it's amazing! Before I purchased this brush I was using the standard brush and it wasn't uncommon to put a lot of stress on the pole going to depths of 10'. I've even replaced a few poles over the years which I do believe that day is over! This Brush will save your pole, save your back & SAVE YOU MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: AGR

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush with thoughtful design
customer_reviews.text: Best brush I’ve used so far. Great for commercial use, the design is ergonomic and makes brushing easy. You can basically use one hand to hold pole and brush down walls (design will help brush stick to wall as you brush downwards). You get what you pay for here, I have one I keep at home for my pool and another for commercial accounts I service.
customer_reviews.author: S.B. - Nashville, TN

customer_reviews.title: Best ever.  So far used for 1 season and no issues
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a half dozen - this is the best one yet
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: pool brush
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it a few times to brush my in-ground pool, when I noticed little bristles floating on the pool surface. I’m replacing with a Pxxxxxx steel brush from elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jay(Min Park)

customer_reviews.title: SWEEPING THROUGH THE POOL
customer_reviews.text: This is made well and works great. My husband has used this for pool every week and it’s holding up. Will buy again if we need too.
customer_reviews.author: D & J Angel

customer_reviews.title: This brush works!
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this pool brush. Bad summer for algae so needed a brush capable of cleaning in-ground gunnite pool walls as well as bottom. This is a HUGE help.
customer_reviews.author: Con Brio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This brush is no much easier then the other brushes I had . So glad I got it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick bristles and good for corners.
customer_reviews.text: This brush has very thick, and soft, bristles. It's good in corners and it has a mechanical method to depress the plastic indents for inserting and removing the brush from the pole. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Benson

customer_reviews.title: No side bristles and weight
customer_reviews.text: Like was way it connected and disconnected from the wand Dislike: Their are no side bristles for sweeping along the edge and their is not enough weight to it keep it planted down against bottom
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great pool cleaning brush
customer_reviews.text: My husband thanked me for this brush. Said it was his favorite brush thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and assemble. We will see how long it lasts. I'm glad that it doesn't have extra moving parts yet is still designed to be aerodynamic and keep to the wall of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: M. Huh

customer_reviews.title: SUPRISED
customer_reviews.text: THIS SWEEPER WORKED MUCH EASIER THAN MY OLD ONES WILL BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: UNION PLUS

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the pool service industry for over 15 years this is a very good product for the money works very well very sturdy I use it every day on 20 pools a day
customer_reviews.author: Bigkush

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush I Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: Great pool brush! It is weighed perfectly to allow you to smoothly and evenly sweep the bottom and sides of the pool with ease. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I read some of the other ratings before purchasing. For sure it takes a bit more muscle to use this brush as it seems to push down harder on the walls and pool surface. As a result, I believe it is doing a better job of cleaning. I'll write a follow up down the road if anything changes. It has been three years since I purchased this brush. I have to say that it is still good, bristles look good and the brush still works as it did when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what is claims, still sheds bristles some
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better quality than anything I've bought for our beadcrete pool. Still sheds bristles, but the shed is minimal. Definitely keep out of direct sunlight as much as possible to minimize shedding. The design does aid in keeping the brush up against the sides, as advertised, but had to remove a start due to the shedding issue.
customer_reviews.author: AdriannicusTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT - just as advertised! Much easier to sweep the walls with this brush than any of the others I've tried in the past several years. I will purchase another when this one dies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older standard brush that failed. I was intrigued by the fin that was supposed to keep the brush on the wall. I am happy to say it worked as advertised. Brushing the pool is significantly easier with this brush than a standard one. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: better than wall whale
customer_reviews.text: When mybroke its fin, I bought this sweepease brush instead, and was pleasantly surprised because the sweepease model is lighter yet still has enough of a fin to still press into the pool surface as the brush is pushed around the pool. Even though, the whale brush has more rows of bristles (and re-brushes the same spot more with each stroke), if the sweepease is easier to push, it will clean more of the pool in a given amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Brush
customer_reviews.text: The shape presses the brush against the liner as advertised. Makes it easier to apply pressure. The squared off brush gives a wider swath.
customer_reviews.author: T. White

customer_reviews.title: ... Leslie's but since they stopped carrying it I am glad to have found another one
customer_reviews.text: Used to buy at Leslie's but since they stopped carrying it I am glad to have found another one. You can use this brush with just one hand which is great for someone like me with severe shoulder problems
customer_reviews.author: Ray C.

customer_reviews.title: A nice brush....  Feels well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice brush. It has nice action, both forward and backward. Feels well made. The quick release feature is very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: TreeDoctor

customer_reviews.title: Great pool brush.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to owning a pool and am still learning. I have watched friends struggle cleaning pools with these brushes so I really did my research on this one. This brush is well made and actually pushes itself down when moving forward, and up when pulling back on it. It glides across the bottom without having to apply any pressure to remove leaves, pollen and algae from bottom of pool. Don't wait. Get this one today.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: The Best Brush!!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described - "hugs" the sides of the pool making sweeping easy. This replaces one I purchased previously and have used for the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: LindaWS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This brush does exactly what I need. I have an above ground pool and have used it religiously since I bought it. Scrubs well without damage and helps me keep my pool spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Rose

customer_reviews.title: Simplifies a necessary task
customer_reviews.text: Makes brushing the pool a breeze. As an added bonus it comes with an extra plastic clip for the pole in case it breaks..
customer_reviews.author: Austin Boston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, one of my favorite purchases. Makes sweeping fun.
customer_reviews.text: I can sweep my pool one handed (and get a good scrub), get a good solid HEAVY pole, don't use the typical light aluminum junk and the weight of a good pole is enough to keep this brush stuck to the wall. The harder you push the better the scrub, simple idea that makes so much sense and works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Combat Casualty

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Only 4 stars because I wish there were some bristles on the edges of the product. They did not advertise that there were, I just wish they did. I bought this as a replacement for my broken whale tail brush. This new brush is much lighter in weight and does a great job in hugging the wall. Brushes the pool nicely. I'm glad I bought it. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: KD Florida

customer_reviews.title: One-way cleaning at its best
customer_reviews.text: Have to agree with previous reviews, this brush is outstanding for what it does. Keep in mind though, it's more of a one-way brush in that the same principles that make it hug the wall as your sweeping downward also pull it off the wall when you're pulling up. If you're okay with just cleaning one direction, this is outstanding.... nearly effortless.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: In sweeping either by push or pull it's far superior to the brush/broom I used before. Also seems a bit lighter in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Landsbaum

customer_reviews.title: Can't see that it is any different than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't see that it is any different than any other pool brush. Certainly doesn't generate the pressure on the wall and floor surfaces that it's predecessor brushes with the big tail fin did. That was what I was looking for and this brush isn't close to being on par with the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Rydyr

customer_reviews.title: Thin Plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: Brush didn't last long, the plastic inserts broke after a few months, the plastic can be molded into a stronger mold, but this cheap plastic alone creates a very high risk for failure and then this brush is absolutely useless. Good Luck
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy brush that will last you more than a couple seasons... the shaped head helps keep it on the wall when your brushing the wall.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Works as should
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to use along the walls of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Really works well. I have tried a lot of different kinds and this one looks like the best.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the regular cheap brush. It doesn't skip when pushing it down the pool walls.
customer_reviews.author: james b spencer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a circular shaped brush that lasted about 8 months. This one will hopefully last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Yardslave

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning the pool a breeze
customer_reviews.text: If you are a young lady who has a problem sweeping the sides of your pool, hey, pool water has quite a bit of resistance. What this does is cut the resistance so it makes cleaning the sides of the pool a breeze. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: laura tierney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than the cheaper white bristle brushes. Cleans well and no bristles coming off when scrubbing vigorously.
customer_reviews.author: Mfam4

customer_reviews.title: Does good job and not loosing any bristles so far
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 2 summers and used frequently in our aboveground pool. Does good job and not loosing any bristles so far. Hoping for a 3rd year of use come next spring!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool brush
customer_reviews.text: Great pool brush. Must easier to sweet than the brush that came with the pool. We will see how long it lasts and if the bristles start coming out like they did with my initial brush.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure this was going to work but gave it a try anyway. To my smazment it did a great job. I've told all my friends it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush for its ease of use on my above ground vinyl pool. It is wide which makes less work since it covers more surface area. I did not notice it being easier to brush than a standard one but works good anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie amzshpr

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I could use it with one hand to brush the deep in of my diving pool. Very impressed with how to stuck to the pool edge surface.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy brush 👌
customer_reviews.text: So easy for my gunite pool replastering!! I had to use my old brush and working with that was brutal... then I got this brush and I will never dread brushing the walls anymore!!
customer_reviews.author: H Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easdy to use, good bristles.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made pool brush. It does the job nicely and seems to be well made. I have only had to for a few weeks and pool season is ending in Central Pa but so far it is nicely made and looks like it will last. The bristles are strong and the shape is just right for getting into the corners and up and down the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Moses

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy brush. Gets the job fone. Easy to put on and remove from poll.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Best sweeper I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the greatest sweeper made. The angled ribs help push it down as you sweep, we have a pool that has an oval shaped deep end (dough boy pool) and the deep curved walls were impossible to sweep, this bad boy gets it all and is super durable. Wishing I would have found this much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Infidex

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described. Don't store in same place ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Don't store in same place you keep your chemicals though. You will shorten the lifespan dramatically when the chemicals attack the plastic and bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Jorsta

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush, but the water foil doesn't really contribute ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush, but the water foil doesn't really contribute much. One review mentioned that the reviewer was now able to use one hand to clean the pool after purchasing this product. I was impressed by this statement until I realized that I always use one hand on the brush handle--otherwise I would fall in the pool! So, the brush does a nicer job than my old brush but only due to the nice bristles. It isn't really any easier to use than a brush without a foil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but saying it sticks to the walls like a magnet is pushing it a lot. I would say its really not much better than a regular brush. I gave it 4 stars as its better than the whale attachment / idea since the pieces are bonded together, otherwise it would get 3 stars as just OK, nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph and Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this pool brush!! Better than any other we have used!
customer_reviews.author: Misty D Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Pool Brush
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and after a number of years am replacing it, for good product.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu XTI

customer_reviews.title: the brush works great as it is angle as a airfoil so it ...
customer_reviews.text: the brush works great as it is angle as a airfoil so it pushes down as you push forward. it does slow down the process of retrieving it but that is ti be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent quality and 'value added' brush
customer_reviews.text: High quality brush with the added benefit of providing some force against the wall as well. We had the 'whale tail' brush, which also worked, but had moving part & pivot, which wore and broke. This is an excellent quality and 'value added' brush. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Croy

customer_reviews.title: The white clip broke after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to have them send me a new white clip but I can not figure out how to contact them. Please help!!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Longo

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for freeform pool
customer_reviews.text: Holds great to the pool bottom/walls. Strong bristles. Best brush I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca flick

customer_reviews.title: Sweep and sleep
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It sure makes it easier. Especially behind the pool steps and very reasonable. My other favorite pool tool.
customer_reviews.author: debo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sweep bottom of the pool
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be easier to keep on the bottom of the pool when I am sweeping back and forth. Lasted through 1 season but we will see next year if the bristles start falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is not Quality material
customer_reviews.text: It has corroded very fast so you must take precautions to keep the cheap aluminum dry and out of everyday air.
customer_reviews.author: 1st Time Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This brush works great. Does exactly what it says it will, clings to the walls with added pressure. Makes cleaning the pool so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great brush. It sticks to the wall while brushing
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. It sticks to the wall while brushing, so it doesn't require great upper body strength. With our previous brush only my husband could do it because I wasnt strong enough to make the brush stick to the wall all the way down. This brush also has a bigger footprint so less brush strokes are required to sweep entire pool. I'm 5,3 130lbs and I can brush our entire pool in less than 15 mins with using this brush. Previously I couldn't finish the pool sweeping, my husband had to do the deep end.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Beat the pool store brush
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great pool brush. It beats the one I purchased at the pool store. This brush is far better than that one. And they are the same price. So I'm content with this one. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed (The Bull) Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Brush
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pool brushes I've used as a pool professional. NO metal bristles or magnetic ends that will rust.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the brush that I've been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: scott s.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd. Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd. Works okay. Last one plastic became brittle after a couple of years in texas sun
customer_reviews.author: Nick Dray

customer_reviews.title: pool brush
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy duty brush and works fine, but I don't really see any difference between this and a regular brush. Doesn't seem to grip any differently.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Worked good BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked good and made brushing much easier, but the metal device holding the brush onto the pole broke after six weeks of use. Now the brush is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen E.

customer_reviews.title: Actually, for being so light (my 6 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually, for being so light (my 6 year old grandson can use it), this product works well. Sticks to the walls when scrubbing them (I have a vinyl-lined built-in pool).
customer_reviews.author: drChaosCA

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. Very few bristles fall out compared to other brushes I have purchased. It stays against the wall with less pressure than other brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: I think this one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I have used one time. I like it very much. I helps me to sweep algae in the bottom of my pool. It's much better than those hard plastic end brushes. I will not leave in the heat all summer. I move it to the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Really hugs the sides. Yes, it is a bit harder to pull it up, but it's worth the extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: campy

customer_reviews.title: Does hold to the bottom and sides of the pool ...
customer_reviews.text: Does hold to the bottom and sides of the pool exceptionally well. It is much sturdier and should last longer than our previous several brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush!
customer_reviews.text: All the raving about the product is spot on. Great brush
customer_reviews.author: Kevin DaSilva

customer_reviews.title: Good brush.
customer_reviews.text: Found this recomended by a pool tech on You Tube. Works great. Had to replace my free be my pool installer gave with the pool. This pool brush seems to be made well and should last long.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product for the advertised application.
customer_reviews.text: The brush appears to be well made, but the design does not work well. When I attempt to brush the pool wall, the bristles hop down the wall instead of a smooth brushing motion. This is because when brushing the pool wall, the pole is parallel to the pool wall and the bristles are angled forward about 45 degrees. This causes the tips of the bristles to catch on the texture of the wall and the head of the brush hops down the wall. The bristles should be at a right angle to the wall to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweep Your Pool with Ease
customer_reviews.text: It is in the name...sweep with ease. This works wonders for our pool, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yerania Martell DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Safe for use on all pools
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I should have bought the bigger one, but this one works for what I need it to do. I'm not sure if the design really makes it go through the water better because in my opinion, it's the same. That being said, as a brush it works.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D.

customer_reviews.title: very good item
customer_reviews.text: it does exactly what it says, when I sweep my pool the brush never lifts up, it stays right on the surface, does a great job and it very easy to maneuver, you can't go wrong with this item, when this one wears out I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: JZL

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: sturdy construction; it's shape helps with leverage against pool sides; doesn't lose bristles into the pool. recommended for DIY pool peopel.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cowden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: It really hugs the walls when brushing and less effort to pull up and down in the water
customer_reviews.author: Ram

product_meta.title: SweepEase 654367706299-100% POLY-18 Brush Small Green
product_meta.description: Size:18-InchSweepEase Aquadynamic pool brush sticks the walls and floor like a magnet! This high quality patented spoiler shape applies 5-10 pounds of pressure to the walls and floor, yet easily glides back through the water. With a quick release unbreakable aluminum handle, and design to always make 100% contact helping remove algae, sodium and calcium, keeping your pool perfectly clean, looking like new!. 60 years of drudgery is over. Now all it takes is one hand! Pool pros, women, paraplegics' even kids can easily and thoroughly clean their pool. SweepEase, you're gonna love it!
feature_bullets: "Sweep Ease Sticks to the walls and floor like a magnet!" After 60 years of drudgery, there is finally an EASY way to sweep your pool!
The patented spoiler shape uses water to push the brush to the walls and floor with 5-10 pounds of pressure, yet easily slices back through the water.
Made with the highest quality materials that never bends so it makes 100% contact every time
Regular use helps stop the aging of your pool by removing algae, calcium and sodium keeping your pool perfectly clean, looking like new!
Sweep Ease "Sticks to the walls and floor like a magnet! You're gonna love it!"
